title: Joy
verses: Nehemiah 8:10 (WEB) — "Then he said to them, “Go your way, eat the fat, drink the sweet, and send portions to those for whom nothing is prepared; for today is holy to our Lord. Don’t be grieved, for the joy of Yahweh is your strength.”"
John 15:11 (WEB) — "I have spoken these things to you, that my joy may remain in you, and that your joy may be made full."
Psalm 16:11 (WEB) — "You will show me the path of life. In your presence is fullness of joy. In your right hand there are pleasures forever more."
Philippians 4:4 (WEB) — "Rejoice in the Lord always! Again I will say, “Rejoice!”"
Romans 15:13 (WEB) — "Now may the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that you may abound in hope, in the power of the Holy Spirit."
body: The joy of the Lord is not fragile cheerfulness but the strong gladness of His presence with us. Abide in Christ’s words, practice gratitude, and share generously—joy grows by giving.
prayer: God of hope, fill me with joy and peace as I trust You. Teach me to abide in Your love and to overflow with hope by Your Spirit. Amen.
